Electronics Engineering  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
 (i)  BAUCHI accepts  
(a) NCE merit in Electrical/Electronics Education Sciences. 
NCE in Electrical/Electronics Education with five (5) 
years teaching experience.  
(b) ND lower credit in Electrical/Electronics.  
(c) 'A’ level passes in Mathematics and Physics.  
  
  
UTME  
 (i)  BAUCHI  
(a) requires 'O’ level credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Physics/General Sciences/Electrical 
Electronics Trades and any other two (2) relevant 
Science subjects.   
(b) accepts credit pass in Arithmetic or General Science 
or Technical Trades in lieu of  Mathematics or 
Biology or Physics respectively.  
  
UTME  
(i) BAUCHI requires Mathematics, Physics and any other 
Science subject.
